cause.description:
SaveAfricaNow is a community of "Someones" who take action for Africa's millions of orphaned children due to AIDS. SaveAfricaNow has no political agenda, nor does it seek to influence governments or politics. Its sole purpose is to serve the innocent children in Africa who have been affected by HIV/AIDS either directly or through a family member
Or you can go here and help out http://www.saveafricanow.org/
1. Aids in africa needs help
2. stop poverty
3. Have places for fresh water
cause.name: Save africa Now!
